snippet: The trustee liquidating the firm of Bernard L. Madoff, the Ponzi scheme operator, began distributing an additional $351.6 million to Mr. Madoff’s former customers, increasing the amount paid to nearly $6 billion.
abstract: Irving H Picard, trustee liquidating firm of Bernard L Madoff, begins distributing an additional $351.6 million to Madoff’s former customers, increasing amount paid to nearly $6 billion.
